statements: SELECT * FROM conversation_history WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT conversation_id, message, timestamp FROM conversation_history WHERE channel = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM conversation_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT channel FROM conversation_history;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(conversation_id) AS num_conversations FROM conversation_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_conversations > 5;
SELECT * FROM conversation_history WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT conversation_id, customer_id, channel FROM conversation_history WHERE channel = 'Email' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT conversation_id, message FROM conversation_history WHERE conversation_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT customer_id, channel, message FROM conversation_history WHERE channel = 'Phone' AND customer_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM conversation_history WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM conversation_history WHERE sender = 'Alice';
SELECT message, timestamp FROM conversation_history WHERE conversation_id = 12345;
SELECT sender, message, timestamp FROM conversation_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_details WHERE phone_number LIKE '%12345%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM conversation_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender, message FROM conversation_history WHERE sender='Alice' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT MAX(conversation_id) AS max_id FROM conversation_history;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM conversation_history JOIN customer_details ON conversation_history.conversation_id = customer_details.customer_id WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM conversation_history WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, message FROM conversation_history WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_profile WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_profile WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT type_name, description FROM channel_types ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM conversation_history WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM conversation_history WHERE channel_type = 'email' AND LENGTH(message) > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profile WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT id, type_name FROM channel_types WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS message_count FROM conversation_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(customer_id) >= 3;
SELECT * FROM conversation_history WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT conversation_id, timestamp FROM conversation_history WHERE channel = 'Email' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_profile WHERE customer_id = 2002;
SELECT agent_id, name, email, phone FROM agent_details WHERE agent_id = 3003;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM channel_details WHERE platform = 'Facebook' ORDER BY channel_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profile WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT conversation_id, message, timestamp FROM conversation_history WHERE channel='Email' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone, address FROM customer_profile WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM channel_details WHERE channel_type = 'Social Media' LIMIT 5;
SELECT agent_id, name, email FROM agent_details ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT agent_name, email FROM Agents WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM Channels WHERE channel_type = 'Social Media';
SELECT conversation_id, start_time, end_time FROM Conversations WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Conversations ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT conversation_id, channel, start_time, end_time FROM Conversations WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT agent_name, email FROM Agents WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';

SELECT * FROM Messages JOIN Conversations ON Conversations.conversation_id = Messages.conversation_id WHERE Messages.sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY Messages.message_time ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
